title: Dominus eSports Recruitment - Diamond +
body:
Greetings,

For a long time I've been wanting to start a team and would like to grant the opportunity for players to experience the natures of playing as a team. As much as I would love to see players grow as a team, I would love to see a team grow as a family. Although I won't be part of the team roster, I will be managing the team and taking notes on weaknesses, strengths etc. So if you're interested in joining this team, I will be providing a template for you to insert your details.

(sorry for putting these in caps, easier to read that way)
IGN:
AGE:
MAIN ROLE:
CHAMP POOL:
SKYPE:
PREFERRED PLAY TIME:
REASON FOR APPLYING FOR TEAM:

Another thing I would like to add. Don't bother if you're just going to leave after joining, we all have lives and time is worth too much to be wasted.

replies.body: Can't get out of Bronze :/ would love to join a SA team though...

IGN: Daemon
AGE: 21
MAIN ROLE: Mid>Support
CHAMP POOL: Vast. Most Mids and over half the supports.
SKYPE: Yes I use, I won't post it though ;)
PREFERRED PLAY TIME: Almost anytime, I'm NZ based but pretty flexible.
REASON FOR APPLYING FOR TEAM: Pretty generic. Love the game, but the solo que grind gets old. 5's is tons of fun and I'm competitive so teams that can't stick together/have less emphasis on winning disappoint me.

IGN: Saucygibbon
AGE: 23
MAIN ROLE: Top
CHAMP POOL: Irelia, renek, nasus to name a few
SKYPE: Yes
PREFERRED PLAY TIME: Any time
REASON FOR APPLYING FOR TEAM: Enjoy playing 5s

IGN: ALL Gizzel LoL
AGE: 26
MAIN ROLE: Mid
CHAMP POOL: Alot
SKYPE: Yes
PREFERRED PLAY TIME: Any time
REASON FOR APPLYING FOR TEAM: Solo q doesnt excite me. 

I'm D4 after a break, i have another account almost diamond aswell, ive played in pretty much every online/lan tournament.

IGN: Prombear (Currently P1 after decay, Peaked d3)
AGE: 20
MAIN ROLE: ADC
CHAMP POOL: In order of ability: Vayne, Caitlyn/Lucian, Tristana, Graves, Corki
SKYPE: Benz-jammin
PREFERRED PLAY TIME: Any time, I am based in NZ
REASON FOR APPLYING FOR TEAM: Predominantly looking to join a team so I can add some more structure to my game play. Grinding soloq feels fairly meaningless at the moment, it would be cool to find a bunch of hardworking players that are willing to commit as much time and effort to the game as I am.
